roleset.name: to fill or repair with plastic paste
roleset.note: SPACKLE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. (from spackle.01-v)

example.name: makeup spackle, arg0
example.text: With lipsticks , liners , lotions and creams , There are still beauty plans left to tackle : But as the years go by , it seems That before I paint , I should spackle .

example.name: Wow, all args
example.text: David Starkey slapped the fat lad and made him do press-ups until he spackled the walls with regurgitated Snickers bars.
